insert into yeps_files values (yeps_files_seq.nextval, #{mnum, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{rnum, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{rvnum, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{evnum, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{filename}, #{origin_filename}, #{filesize}, #{file_content, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sysdate, 'y')
mapper.update: update yeps_files set file_content = #{file_content, jdbcType=VARCHAR} where filenum = #{filenum}
mapper.select: select * from yeps_files where filename = #{filename, jdbcType=VARCHAR} or filenum = #{filenum, jdbcType=INTEGER} order by filenum desc

update yeps_files set ismainphoto='y' where evnum=#{evnum} and filenum=#{filenum}
